General.Name: Genmin Ltd
General.Description: Genmin Limited, an exploration and development company, produces iron ores in Africa. Its flagship project is the Baniaka iron ore located in south-east of Gabon. Genmin Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Perth, Australia.
